Node.definition: = to bring together people, animals, plants, and/or other things from different places for a common purpose
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= person selected from among the young men of a tribe or nation to join the army

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= state in which a countable entity is thirty in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= town, also known as Kiriath Jearim (קִרְיַת יְעָרִים) Kiriath Baal (קִרְיַת־בַּעַל) and Baalah (בַּעֲלָה) ◄ territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or objects to go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot or carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: (one's) name is called (over someone); hence: = state in which a person or building is closely associate to another person or a deity
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior
= action by which humans or deities assume a position of leadership, ◄ as if sitting on an actual throne
= heavenly creature with wings, ► carrying the throne of God, symbol of God's majesty, and associated with his presence
= causative action by which humans or deities make (other) humans ride on a domestic animal such as a donkey (חֲמֹור) or a horse (סוּס) in a chariot (מֶרְכָּבָה) or on a cart (עֲגָלָה)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= two or four wheeled carriage or cart, used for travel or the transport of loads; pulled by draft animals, such as oxen (שֹׁור) donkeys (חֲמֹור) or horses (סוּס)
= state in which an object has been in existence for only a short time ◄ because of having recently been built or produced

literally: to cause to hold, carry; hence: = causative action by which humans bring an object to another location by using a means of transportation like an animal, cart, ship, or even one's own shoulder

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= man; ◄ from Kiriath Jearim (קִרְיַת יְעָרִים) ► father of Ahio (אַחְיֹו) and Uzza (עֻזָּא)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a mountain (הַר)
= man, also known as Uzzah (עֻזָּה) ◄ son of Abinadab (אֲבִינָדָב)
= man; ◄ son of Abinadab (אֲבִינָדָב) brother of Uzzah (עֻזָּא)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ from Kiriath Jearim (קִרְיַת יְעָרִים) ► father of Ahio (אַחְיֹו) and Uzza (עֻזָּא)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= two or four wheeled carriage or cart, used for travel or the transport of loads; pulled by draft animals, such as oxen (שֹׁור) donkeys (חֲמֹור) or horses (סוּס)
= state in which an object has been in existence for only a short time ◄ because of having recently been built or produced

literally: to cause to hold, carry; hence: = causative action by which humans bring an object to another location by using a means of transportation like an animal, cart, ship, or even one's own shoulder

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= man; ◄ from Kiriath Jearim (קִרְיַת יְעָרִים) ► father of Ahio (אַחְיֹו) and Uzza (עֻזָּא)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a mountain (הַר)

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= man; ◄ son of Abinadab (אֲבִינָדָב) brother of Uzzah (עֻזָּא)
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= action by which humans engage in activities associated with joy and contentment by leaping, dancing, celebrating, and even engaging in games
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a single piece of wood taken from a tree, cut and finished, and used for building and construction

exact meaning unsure: = one of the evergreen trees commonly found in the Lebanon, with round leaves rather than flat; its fruit is a a mostly inedible seed bearing, fleshy cone; ≈ regarded as one of the glorious trees of the Lebanon

= musical instrument consisting of a sound box ◄ made of wood, out of the ends or sides of which projected two arms; the arms supported a crosspiece; strings descended from the crosspiece over the sound box and the number of strings could vary; ► often used to accompany singing
exact meaning unsure; probably: = a soundbox made of wood with strings of animal intestines stretched over the top, parallel to the soundbox

= musical instrument, consisting of a membrane, usually of animal skin, which was stretched over a shallow circular, triangular, or square frame; ► it was struck sharply with one or two hands, depending on where it was situated; it could be held in one hand, under the arm, or against the chest and struck with the other hand, or it could be held on the knees or the ground and struck with one or two hands; the fingers of one hand could be used to tighten or loosen the tension on the membrane as it was struck
= musical instrument made of small closed pottery containers holding small rattling pellets; when shaken, they provided the rhythm to accompany dancing
= paired round thin metal plate like objects ► struck together to produce a loud clashing sound as part of musical accompaniment
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

m.definition: = threshing floor; ◄ belonging to Nacon (נָכֹון) also known as Kidon (כִּידֹון) location unknown
= threshing floor (גֹּרֶן) ◄ belonging to Nacon, also known as Kidon (כִּידֹון) location unknown

Node.gloss: to stretch out (one's) hand|to stretch out (one's) right hand|to lay (one's) hand
Node.definition: = action by which humans stretch out their hand, right hand, or finger in order to do point with it or to put it in position for another action
= man, also known as Uzzah (עֻזָּה) ◄ son of Abinadab (אֲבִינָדָב)

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.gloss: to grasp|to take hold of (something)|to seize|to catch|to hold on (to something)
Node.definition: = to take hold of someone or something; humans typically do this with their hands and animals use their mouths; however, it is often extended to include inanimate objects (traps), personalized qualities (wisdom), emotions (anger, fear), or processes (time)
= process by which an animal fails to grip or make proper contact with a surface

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth
= process by which the anger (אַף) of humans and deities is aroused ◄ like a fire that is kindled
= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man, also known as Uzza (עֻזָּא) ◄ son of Abinadab (אֲבִינָדָב)
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= process by which humans or deities experience extreme displeasure, ◄ described as an internal fire
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a linker introducing a proposition denoting the reason for what precedes
= action by which deities break emotionally through the barrier of patience and show their anger against someone else
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which deities break emotionally through the barrier of patience and show their anger against someone else
= man, also known as Uzza (עֻזָּא) ◄ son of Abinadab (אֲבִינָדָב)
literally: to cry out; hence: = action by which humans or deities assign a name to a person, place, object, or phenomenon
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= location; ◄ near threshing floor of Nacon (גֹּרֶן נָכֹון) ► here YHWH killed Uzzah (עֻזָּא) because he touched the ark (אֲרֹון) of the covenant (בְּרִית)
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= referent to the way in which an event is performed; ► normally with the intention of finding out how, but often used in rhetorical questions in order to express one's conviction that that event in question cannot be performed at all (under the given circumstances)

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which someone is willing to do something
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= area within a town, in most cases protected by its own wall
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= causative action by which humans cause other humans to leave the main road to interrupt their journey or take a side road
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= man; ◄ from Gath (גַּת) ► who kept the ark (אֲרֹון) of the covenant (בְּרִית) stored in his house after the death of Uzzah (עֻזָּה)
= inhabitant of Gath (גַּת)
= state in which humans remain in a place that is not their home for a relatively short time

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= man; ◄ from Gath (גַּת) ► who kept the ark (אֲרֹון) of the covenant (בְּרִית) stored in his house after the death of Uzzah (עֻזָּה)
= inhabitant of Gath (גַּת)
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: for the sake of|for the benefit of|because of
Node.definition: = particle linking proposition X to participant Y, by which Y represents the cause or beneficiary of X

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= man; ◄ from Gath (גַּת) ► who kept the ark (אֲרֹון) of the covenant (בְּרִית) stored in his house after the death of Uzzah (עֻזָּה)
= area within a town, in most cases protected by its own wall
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= state in which humans feel and show great joy
= action by which humans put one foot before the other in order to move forward

Node.gloss: to take up|to lift up|to carry
Node.definition: literally: to lift up; hence: = action by which humans take hold of objects with their hands, with the intention of holding them or bringing them to another location

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which a countable entity is six in number

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
= a young animal that has been fattened to prepare it for slaughter, either for food or sacrifice
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
exact meaning unknown; probably: = action by which humans move along in a light and joyful way, ≈ which some may consider inappropriate for people of high status
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: to be girded with|to wear (clothes, armor)
Node.definition: = state in which someone wears clothes or armor
= garment; reaching from the shoulders to the waist; ◄ made from linen; ► normally worn by priests (כֹּהֵן) but also by David (דָּוִד) when the ark was brought to Jerusalem

= woven material ◄ made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; ► used for production of clothes; worn by priests and supernatural beings; ≈ associated with quality, strength, and coolness
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or objects to go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot or carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= loud sound ◄ produced either by the human voice or by musical instruments ► used to express an emotion or to communicate something to a community
= a musical instrument ◄ made from a ram's horn; ► sound is produced by blowing into the small end; ► used for giving signals and during festivals and celebrations

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= area within a town, in most cases protected by its own wall
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= woman; ◄ daughter of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) younger sister of Merab (מֵרַב) ► wife of David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= relation denoting that someone performs a certain event via the path of something else

= an opening ◄ in the wall of a building, ► which admits light and often air to a room and allows its occupants to look out, or objects within to be seen; in some cases they can be opened and closed; sometimes used as secret entrance or exit; ≈ has therefore some connonations of secrecy

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
exact meaning unknown; probably: = action by which humans move along in a light and joyful way, ≈ which some may consider inappropriate for people of high status
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to despise|to disdain|to scorn|to consider (something) beneath (oneself)
Node.definition: = state in which someone considers someone or something else unworthy of attention or respect, and shows that by his/her actions
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans place other humans or objects in a certain location

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to stretch out (one's) tent; hence: = causative action by which humans erect their tent by stretching out the tent curtains over a structure of poles
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
literally: to make go up; hence: = causative process by which humans offer a burnt offering and cause its smoke to go up
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which deities, humans, or animals bring an activity to full completion
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
literally: to make go up; hence: = causative process by which humans offer a burnt offering and cause its smoke to go up

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: name; hence: = state in which someone acts with the authority of someone else
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior
= causative action by which humans divide an object (or range of objects) into portions and share them out among each other
= a large group of people

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
particle linking two objects, of which the first is not always listed explicitly; = relation indicating that object X and object Y are at opposite ends of a range of similar objects
= woman as a social class, to be distinguished from the men and the children

= type of bread (לֶחֶם) shaped like a ring, ◄ made out of fine flour (סֹלֶת) and other ingredients by baking (אפה) it in an oven (תַּנּוּר) ► used as food, also sacrificed to God (usually unleavened) and then eaten by priests and Levites; ≈ regarded as high quality bread
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= cake ◄ made out of dates and cooked or raw cereals
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= cake; ◄ made of dried, compressed grapes; ► possibly eaten at festivals and other special ceremonies
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= woman; ◄ daughter of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) younger sister of Merab (מֵרַב) ► wife of David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= action by which humans purposefully move in the direction of (another) human, deity, or object to engage with them
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= action by which humans and deities bring honor and respect upon themselves

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which someone takes off his/her clothes, either entirely or in part, ► as a result of which that person becomes naked or improperly dressed, ≈ which is considered a shameful thing to do

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= woman who is the legal property of someone else; either married or eligible for marriage; her children belong to the person who owns her; ≈ because of this an אָמָה appears to have a somewhat higher status than a שִׁפְחָה even though both terms are sometimes used interchangeably

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= action by which someone takes off his/her clothes, either entirely or in part, ► as a result of which that person becomes naked or improperly dressed, ≈ which is considered a shameful thing to do
= action by which someone takes off his/her clothes, either entirely or in part, ► as a result of which that person becomes naked or improperly dressed, ≈ which is considered a shameful thing to do
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= woman; ◄ daughter of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) younger sister of Merab (מֵרַב) ► wife of David (דָּוִד)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a person in a position of high authority over a nation, a division of priests or levites, or an army
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= action by which humans engage in activities associated with joy and contentment by leaping, dancing, celebrating, and even engaging in games
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to be worthless|to be insignificant|to be of no account
Node.definition: = state in which humans have a reduced value or reduced importance, mostly in the eyes of someone else

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= woman who is the legal property of someone else; either married or eligible for marriage; her children belong to the person who owns her; ≈ because of this an אָמָה appears to have a somewhat higher status than a שִׁפְחָה even though both terms are sometimes used interchangeably
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans refer to a particular object when speaking

Node.gloss: to be honorable|to be worthy of honor|to be renowned
Node.definition: = state in which humans and deities are regarded as worthy of honor and respect
= woman; ◄ daughter of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) younger sister of Merab (מֵרַב) ► wife of David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= posterity of humans and or animals of undetermined sex, at an age ranging from before birth to adulthood
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= process by which humans or animals stop living
